H0.text: Erosion is the greater extent that results from bigger ocean waves and waves that carry more sediment.

H1.text: Drowning is caused by bigger ocean waves and waves that carry more sediment, leading to a greater extent.

H2.text: Silt is the greater extent produced by bigger ocean waves and waves that carry more sediment.

H3.text: Sand dunes are the greater extent caused by bigger ocean waves and waves that carry more sediment.

A4.text: Aeolian sediment transport is the process that results in the formation of ripples and sand dunes.
